text: I guess about once a week I take the
slow road to work takes about twice as
long as the bike so it's not so very
efficient but it's just such a lovely
way to travel and you can see especially
when you go into tons of Darlington
bridge all the traffic you know I look
up and I think oh I could be up there
I'm not in the boat and it's lovely
sometimes when I come back it's sort of
starting to get dusk and that's just the
most lovely time on the river and you
feel as if you've done something
completely different the great see more
kayakers commuting it's a great way to
